description:
## What makes Boostnote great?
* Using Boostnote Offline - There is no internet connection? It's OK. You can use the Boostnote.
* Markdown Note - Keep Markdown Notes with a instant renderer.
* Snippet Note - Just like Gist, keep your snippets as a note.
* Multiple Hotkeys - Like Command N and D, you can use multiple hotkeys.
* Finder Popup - Just like spotlight of OS X, Search your note when working with other app.
* Latex Support - With $ and $$, write some equations.

## Notes
New Boost Note app is required an online account and login.
https://github.com/BoostIO/BoostNote-App
summary: Boostnote is an open source note-taking app. Evernote alternative for programmers! For Windows 64bit.
author: Maisin&Co.
